name: Journey of the Homebound Wizard
description:
Journey of the homebound wizard is a platformer which allows the player to collect various additional movement abilities.

 
While on the journey grab potion ingredients and see if you can get them all before reaching heading home!

Use the wasd or arrowkeys to move and the mouse to aim the owl! 

This game is made for CreateJam Spring 2020, which had the theme "Some Wizard and the mystery of the smoking owl", and while this theme has a noir feel to it "Journey of the Homebound Wizard" does not utilize this with the exception of the heavy darkness present in the game. The darkness was simply inspired by noir, as it means black, and not film noir.

Thanks to Christian Mylin Søgaard-Meyer for his design of the "wizard"-character.
